value.title: Oregon State's bipedal robot, Cassie, sets Guinness World Record in 100-meter dash
value.excerpt: A bipedal robot named Cassie just set an official Guinness World Record by running 100 meters in 24.73 seconds. With knees that bend like an ostrich's, Cassie is the first bipedal robot to use machine learning to control a running stride on outdoor terrain.
